Uses of Class
TheWorldSaviors.Demon

    • Uses of Demon in TheWorldSaviors

      Methods in TheWorldSaviors that return Demon 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Demon Coven.checkRoom(java.lang.Integer row, java.lang.Integer column)
      This is the method used to get the content of a room from the matrix of rooms.
      Methods in TheWorldSaviors that return types with arguments of type Demon 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Demon> Coven.getDemons()
      This is a getter.
      Methods in TheWorldSaviors with parameters of type Demon 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Coven.addDemonIntoTheCoven(Demon demon)
      This is the method used by a demon when he wants to be added into the coven.
      Firstly, the demon will wait in line to be serviced then he will acquire the semaphore for the list of demons and he will let the next one in line to be serviced.
      void Coven.changeRoom(Demon demon, java.lang.Integer oldRow, java.lang.Integer oldColumn, java.lang.Integer row, java.lang.Integer column)
      This is the method used when a demon wants to change its room.
      Firstly, the current demon will acquire the semaphore for the rooms and then he will leave the old room and he will stay in the new room.
